entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening and ending before morning. Snow mixed with rain overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight then northwest 40 gusting to 60. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023
